title: A History of Tennis
itunes:title: A History of Tennis
itunes:subtitle: In this archive episode, David Berry joined Dan to discuss the history of tennis. From the birth of modern tennis in Victorian Britain to the present day, they talk about struggles around sexuality, gender, race & class that have transformed tennis.
description:
In this archive episode, David Berry joined Dan on the pod to discuss the history of tennis. From the birth of modern tennis in Victorian Britain to the present day, they talk about struggles around sexuality, gender, race and class that have transformed the nature of tennis and sport itself.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
